DOC.brief_title: US Cycle Control Blood Pressure Study
DOC.criteria: Female subject request contraception Age : 18 45 year ( inclusive ) ; smoker must older 35 year time informed consent Normal cervical smear require followup ( cervical smear take screen visit normal result document within previous 6 month ) History regular cyclic menstrual period Pregnancy lactation Significant skin reaction transdermal preparation sensitivity surgical / medical tape Any disease may worsen hormonal treatment ( cardiovascular , liver , metabolic ) Use contraceptive method study medication
